answers.answer: I had preeclampisa my first pregnancy had my daughter 33weeks

I had severe preeclampsia with my first and had an emergency c section at 35weeks. I almost died with him.Im 33weeks with my second and so far Im doing fine but i have alot of signs that i will develop it again. Hoping i don't but at least Im being watched more with this one.

question: 22 yrs old. Im currently 31wks 1day with 3rd prgnancy. My daughther is 3 yrs old and was born 34 weeks with preeclampsia. I was pregnant a second time with twins born at 32 weeks with severe eclampsia. All babies i had are beautiful and healthy. It seems like im waiting to get eclampsia again, im at a high risk. Anyone else currently or already delt with preeclampsia or eclampsia? Your not alone! Its scary and im here for friends.
title: preeclampsia and eclampsia survivor
